title: Team LF Players
body:
Trialling players for a team aiming for challenger and competitions. 
Must be D5+ and have r5 experience.
My acc is Rico add it and tell me what role you play/champs. (I'm currently d5 with 2 master teams).

1st edit since my FL is capped just post your ign and I'll add you. Thank you!

replies.body: F You All yea thats my name.
